CustomField.description: Open indicates an ongoing Recurring Donation. Fixed indicates a Recurring Donation that has a specific number of installments. For Fixed, you must also populate the Number of Planned Installments field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Open indicates an ongoing Recurring Donation. Fixed indicates a Recurring Donation that has a specific number of installments. For Fixed, you must also populate the Number of Planned Installments field.
CustomField.label: Recurring Donation Recurring Type
